article:
The following is a list of Italian municipalities with population over
50,000. [http://demo.istat.it/bil2010/index.html Istat demographic balance
2010] Figures are based on 1981, 1991 and 2001 Istat censuses, plus data
from official demographic balance evaluated from January 1, 2010 to December
31st, 2010. ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]]
